name: MINOVATION PTY. LTD.
about: MINOVATION PTY. LTD. is a premier flight training institution based at Jandakot Airport in Perth, Western Australia. We offer comprehensive flight training programs, including Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). Our experienced instructors provide tailored training to meet individual needs, emphasizing commercial aspects and competency standards. We are part of the Piper Flight School Alliance and boast the largest fleet of Piper aircraft in the region. Our goal is to produce commercially ready pilots, ensuring a successful aviation career. We commit to providing a safe, effective, and professional learning environment for all students.
services:
["Recreational Pilot License (RPL)
Private Pilot License (PPL)
Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
Flying in Australia on an overseas license"]
